title: customer data
extract: Customer data is information held on file about customers by a store or other business, usually including names, contact details, and buying habits. Customer data are the firsthand responses that are obtained from customers through investigation or by asking direct questions.
extract_html: Customer data is information held on file about customers by a store or other business, usually including names, contact details, and buying habits. Customer data are the firsthand responses that are obtained from customers through investigation or by asking direct questions.
